settings.markdownTextFunction:
var close_status = false;
var option1 = 'hidden';
var option2 = 'visible';
if (data && data.length) {
    var ds = data[0];
    close_status = ds['close_status'] == 1 ? true : false;
    
    if (close_status) {
        option1 = 'visible';
        option2 = 'hidden';
    }
}

return `<svg width="31" height="140" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
<!-- Created with SVG-edit - https://github.com/SVG-Edit/svgedit-->
<g class="layer">
<title>Layer 1</title>
<rect fill="#e5e5e5" height="140" id="svg_1" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" width="30" x="0" y="0"/>
<rect fill="#f7f7f7" height="80" id="svg_2" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" width="30" x="0" y="30"/>
<circle cx="15" cy="10" fill="#e5e5e5" id="svg_3" r="5" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0"/>
<line fill="none" id="svg_5" stroke="#000000" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-width="2" x1="12" x2="18" y1="10" y2="10"/>
<line fill="none" id="svg_6" stroke="#000000" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-width="2" x1="15" x2="15" y1="7" y2="13"/>
<circle cx="15" cy="10" fill="none" id="svg_7" r="5" stroke="#999999" stroke-linecap="round"/>
<line fill="none" id="svg_8" stroke="#005fbf" stroke-width="2" x1="30" x2="11" y1="34" y2="34"/>
<text fill="#007fff" font-family="Helvetica" font-size="3" font-weight="bold" id="svg_9" stroke="#005fbf" stroke-width="0" text-anchor="middle" transform="matrix(1 0 0 1 0 0)" x="6" xml:space="preserve" y="35">CHINT</text>
<text fill="#000000" font-family="Helvetica" font-size="2" font-weight="bold" id="svg_10" stroke="#005fbf" stroke-width="0" text-anchor="middle" transform="matrix(1 0 0 1 0 0)" x="5" xml:space="preserve" y="38">NB 1-63</text>
<text fill="#000000" font-family="Helvetica" font-size="2" font-weight="bold" id="svg_11" stroke="#005fbf" stroke-width="0" text-anchor="middle" transform="matrix(1 0 0 1 0 0)" x="3" xml:space="preserve" y="41">C16</text>
<rect fill="#cccccc" height="29" id="svg_12" rx="3" ry="3" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" width="26" x="2" y="80"/>
<rect fill="#007fff" height="19" id="svg_13" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" width="18" x="6" y="83"/>
<rect fill="#aad4ff" height="3" id="svg_14" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" width="18" x="6" y="80"/>
<text fill="#003f7f" font-family="Helvetica" font-size="5" font-weight="bold" id="svg_15" opacity="0.35" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" text-anchor="middle" transform="matrix(1 0 0 1 0 0)" x="15" xml:space="preserve" y="88">O OFF</text>
<rect fill="#005fbf" height="2" id="svg_16" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" width="18" x="6" y="89"/>
<rect fill="#005fbf" height="1" id="svg_17" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" width="18" x="6" y="92"/>
<circle cx="15" cy="130" fill="#e5e5e5" id="svg_25" r="5" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0"/>
<line fill="none" id="svg_24" stroke="#000000" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-width="2" x1="12" x2="18" y1="130" y2="130"/>
<line fill="none" id="svg_23" stroke="#000000" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-width="2" x1="15" x2="15" y1="127" y2="133"/>
<circle cx="15" cy="130" fill="none" id="svg_22" r="5" stroke="#999999" stroke-linecap="round"/>
<text fill="#003f7f" font-family="Helvetica" font-size="5" font-weight="bold" id="svg_32" opacity="0.35" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" text-anchor="middle" transform="matrix(1 0 0 1 0 0)" x="15" xml:space="preserve" y="101">1 ON</text>
<rect fill="#aad4ff" height="3" id="svg_33" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 1 0 10)" width="18" x="6" y="92"/>
<rect fill="#005fbf" height="2" id="svg_34" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" width="18" x="6" y="94"/>
<line fill="none" id="svg_37" stroke="#cccccc" x1="15" x2="15" y1="16" y2="30"/>
<line fill="none" id="svg_38" stroke="#cccccc" x1="15" x2="15" y1="110" y2="124"/>
<g id="close" visibility="${option1}" >
<rect fill="#ff0000" height="2" id="svg_27" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" width="6" x="12" y="63"/>
<g id="svg_36">
<rect fill="#007fff" height="7" id="svg_18" rx="1" ry="1" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" width="26" x="2" y="84"/>
<rect fill="#005fbf" height="4" id="svg_19" rx="2" ry="2" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" width="22" x="4" y="82"/>
<rect fill="#005fbf" height="3" id="svg_20" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" width="26" x="2" y="86"/>
<rect fill="#005fbf" height="3" id="svg_21" rx="1" ry="1" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" width="26" x="2" y="84"/>
</g>
</g>
<g id="open" visibility="${option2}" >
<rect fill="#00bf00" height="2" id="svg_26" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" width="6" x="12" y="63"/>
<g id="svg_35">
<rect fill="#007fff" height="7" id="svg_30" rx="1" ry="1" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" width="26" x="2" y="94"/>
<rect fill="#005fbf" height="4" id="svg_29" rx="2" ry="2" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" width="22" x="4" y="98"/>
<rect fill="#005fbf" height="3" id="svg_28" rx="1" ry="1" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" width="26" x="2" y="98"/>
<rect fill="#005fbf" height="3" id="svg_31" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0" width="26" x="2" y="96"/>
</g>
</g>
</g>
</svg>`
